****
BUGS
****

Known bugs Luma 3.x
===================
This is a list of known bugs in Luma 3.x:

- Mockup bug1
- Mockup bug2
- Mockup bug3


How to report bugs
==================
When you encounter a bug in the Luma application, you should get a instructional
message in the *logger window*, or in the console if you started it from there.

You should provide a brief exmplanatino of what you where doing, and send an
email to: bugs@luma.sf.net.
